arts.ttl: Livingston ease into Premiership play-off final with win over Partick Thistle
Intrigue on and off pitch as Livingston meet Partick Thistle
arts.sum: A night of intrigue awaits as Livingston take a 2-0 lead over Partick Thistle into their Scottish Premiership play-off semi-final decider, but the sub-plots off it are almost as fascinating, writes Jonathan Sutherland.
